DOC.brief_title: `` Radial Ultra Support Technique '' ( RUS Technique )
DOC.criteria: Subjects sing informed consent form Subjects eligible percutaneous coronary intervention Age < 18 year > 75 year Subject platelet count < 100,000 cells/mm3 > 700,000 cells/mm3 .
